default.title: Unknown error occured
default.message: Please contact with the development team to resolve the issue.

400.title: Bad Request
400.message: Your request could not be processed due to an error. Please verify your input and try again.

400-CANNOT-REMOVE-USER.title: Cannot Remove User
400-CANNOT-REMOVE-USER.message: Cannot remove user as it would leave at least one permission unassigned. Please make sure to pass the permissions to another account first.

401.title: Unauthorized
401.message: You are not authorized to access this resource. Please log in to continue.

401-SESSION.title: Session expired
401-SESSION.message: Please log in to the panel again.

403.title: Access Denied
403.message: Your account doesn't have the necessary permissions to access this resource.

404.title: {{resource, capitalize}} Not Found
404.message: The {{resource, lowercase}} you are looking for could not be found

404-PAGE.title: Page Not Found
404-PAGE.message: The page you are looking for could not be found. Please check the URL or contact the development team.

408.title: Request Timeout
408.message: The server timed out while waiting for your request.

409.title: Duplicate error
409.message: Resource with this name already exists.

410.title: Resource Gone
410.message: The resource you are looking for is no longer available. Contact the development team if you need help.

418.title: I'm a Teapot
418.message: This server is a teapot, not equipped to handle your request. Try a different server.

429.title: Too Many Requests
429.message: You have exceeded the request limit. Please slow down and try again after a short wait.

500.title: Something bad has happened
500.message: API service could not handle the request because of an internal issue.

503.title: Service unavailable
503.message: API service is either down or unreachable.

600.title: Something bad has happened
600.message: An internal issue in the web application has occurred. Please contact with the development team to resolve it.

650.title: Couldn't Load the Network Configuration
650.message: Error occurred during load due to invalid configuration.

651-undefined.title: Could Not Load The Preset
651-undefined.message: {{key}} is either not defined or empty.

651-CORE-FUNCTION.title: Could Not Load The Preset
651-CORE-FUNCTION.message: Syntax error occurred in the preset's {{key}} core function.

651-VARIABLE.title: Could Not Load The Preset
651-VARIABLE.message: An error occured during calculation of the "{{key}}" variable.

651-CUSTOM-FUNCTION.title: Could Not Load The Preset
651-CUSTOM-FUNCTION.message: An error occured during calculation of the "{{key}}" custom function.

flow-init.title: Network Configuration Loaded
flow-init.message: Successfully created a representation of the present configuration of internal networks.

flow-resetting.title: Refreshing Network Configuration
flow-resetting.message: The machine data is currently being refreshed.

flow-restore.title: Network configuration restored
flow-restore.message: The network configuration was successfuly restored.

state-saved.title: Saved current panel state
state-saved.message: Current positions of the nodes in the flow have been successfully saved.

config-saved.title: Saved intnet configuration
config-saved.message: Network configuration has been successfully updated and saved.

snapshot-create.title: New snapshot created - "{{name}}"
snapshot-create.message: Current configuration was successfuly saved to the snapshot "{{name}}"

snapshot-loaded.title: Snapshot Loaded
snapshot-loaded.message: Successfully loaded network configuration from the snapshot data.
